entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 23. Humidex 25. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 6:01 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
